CustomField.description: The account is blocked and cannot be synced to the integration factor. Please see the Blocked Reason.
CustomField.formula: AND(OR(ISPICKVAL( BlockReason__c, 'Deactivated'), ISPICKVAL( BlockReason__c, 'Proforma')), ISBLANK( NetsuiteCustomerNumber__c ))
CustomField.label: Validate BlockReasonDeactivated
